MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in LL58 postcode area of Beaumaris, affecting properties in Llanddona and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:30PM. In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 1:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:06PM on 10th March 2021.
